data.title: NetSuite Consulting Services
data.meta_description: NetSuite Consulting Services. Consulting Firm Software ERP- Oracle NetSuite consulting services can streamline administrative tasks
data.text:
What is NetSuite ERP?

NetSuite cloud ERP is an all-in-one cloud business management solution that helps organizations operate more effectively by automating core processes and providing real-time visibility into operational and financial performance. With a single, integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, order processing, inventory management, production, supply chain and warehouse operations, NetSuite ERP gives companies clear visibility and forecasting tools into their data and tighter control over their businesses.

NetSuite ERP is an all-in-one cloud business management solution with a customer relationship management NetSuite solution that helps organizations operate more effectively by automating core processes and providing real-time visibility into operational and financial performance. With a single, integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, order processing, inventory management, production, supply chain and warehouse operations, NetSuite platform gives companies clear visibility into their data and tighter control over their businesses.

Versus

What is NetSuite OneWorld?

One Platform for Multi-Company Business Management NetSuite OneWorld enables multi-company business management in real-time and latest insights. NetSuite OneWorld is an optional financial management module of NetSuite that manages the financial consolidation required of separate companies with multiple charts of account, multi-entity marketing and customer support, the management of disparate sales teams and selling partners, and ability for rolled-up multi-company reporting and business intelligence requirements in real-time. OneWorld allows drill-down to all levels in the underlying businesses — to the item level, the customer, record or to an individual transaction. Only with NetSuite OneWorld can you see business operations consolidated information across all your companies AND the very industry expertise data you are interested in within each.

Real-time Management for Multi-Company Businesses

Unlike other products that only allow you to see consolidation only at the level of general ledgers, NetSuite OneWorld provides complete visibility into all areas of each business processes NetSuite OneWorld supports regions, subsidiaries, and separate legal entities with the same parent company with sophisticated accounting/ERP, sales, marketing, support and eCommerce in real time. It provides the ability to manage multiple companies (legal entities), with potentially different currencies, taxation rules, and reporting requirements, within a single NetSuite account. NetSuite OneWorld is the first business strategy software application to automate all the financial aspects of supply chain, selling, such as quotas, forecasts, sales, returns, commissions, and rollbacks and, combined with all other accounting activity, successfully consolidate multiple charts of account — allowing you real-time visibility and the ability to close your books at the period’s end more quickly — even with different currencies and taxation rules.

It is designed for:

• Discrete companies with hierarchical reporting structure to a parent corporation

• Companies that cross borders

• Companies with multiple subsidiaries

• Complex environments that include some or all of these

The average NetSuite customer is typically able to implement its ERP system within three months—much less than the on-premise ERP implementation industry average of a year and a half.

No matter what type of business you’re in, implementing an ERP solution is a critical project that must be taken seriously. From concerns about cost and demonstrating ROI, to practical considerations about who will manage the process at your company, ERP implementation efforts require commitment by a project team and support by business leaders to ensure success.

There’s no getting around the fact that ERP deployment is a major undertaking, but the process doesn’t have to be painful. With proper planning and execution, implementing an ERP system should be a smooth process and quickly improve efficiency across your business.
